title: Unlimited chicken for 65-cent apiece at Church’s Chicken all week long
title_page: Unlimited chicken for 65-cent apiece at Church’s Chicken all week long
text:
To celebrate Church's Chicken 65th anniversary, customers can get unlimited legs and thighs for 65-cent a piece from 2-4 p.m. now through Friday, April 21 at participating locations. If a meal is more your thing, add sides like honey butter biscuits, mashed potatoes and cole slaw
Church's Chicken, various locations .
Free chicken at various Atlanta Chick-fil-a locations tomorrow
